name: Grove of Warding
desc:
When you cast this spell, you must also pay the MP cost for another spell with the Plant tag. You create a 10 foot radius circle of small mushrooms that contains the selected spell. You define the conditions that must be achieved before the spell is activated, such as "when a creature steps inside", or "in one minute". You can be as specific as necessary.

When the conditions are achieved, the spell is cast. If it requires concentration, the grove is considered to concentrate on it. Once the spell ends, the grove vanishes.
author: CrusaderDroid
